sentences.sContent: Gargle and clean your teeth after eating persimmon lest the tannic acid, pectin and sugar damage your teeth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gargle and clean your teeth after eating persimmon lest the tannic acid, pectin and sugar damage your teeth.
sentences.sCn: 吃完柿子记得刷牙漱口，以免柿子中的单宁酸、果胶和糖分，侵蚀牙齿。

words.tran: 制革；制革法；皮肤晒成褐色
鞣革；把…晒黑；鞭笞（tan的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, containing, or produced from tan, tannin, or tannic acid
